html:
6.10.19  1:35 am   what are some nice settings to try in reverbs, i always get lost in so many possibilities on so many knobs 

     almost off

6.10.19  1:25 am   do u think putting a period at the end of a sentence when it is the only sentence on your message/answer/etc. makes it seem harsher

     sometimes

6.10.19  1:05 am   will you ever collab with your past past self

     i do it all the time

      and build on top of an old released track?

     i've done that occasionally

6.9.19  11:27 pm   Do you use guitar strings?

     not usually

      If so what's your preferred thickness. I prefer them on the thicker side.

6.9.19  11:08 pm   would you mind sharing another snippet of a test or new technique you've been working on? 

     i would like to but that would be irresponsible

6.9.19  9:47 pm   what keeps you up at night?

     sleeping during the day

6.9.19  8:53 pm   what's your opinion on cats

     i think the meow aspect is very interesting

6.9.19  8:46 pm   Why humans don't have wings?

     so they can be challenged to invent some

6.9.19  8:14 pm   how do you feel about songs that sound entirely different on different pieces of listening hardware

     every song does, and i feel nervous. but that's part of living on this planet. that's why they call it "nervous planet"

6.9.19  7:25 pm   I'm getting a bit restless. Could you share even a tiny something of a spoiler or hint towards the video

     i'm lucky if i haven't already damn near spoiled the whole entire thing

6.9.19  6:29 pm   Do you have a note taking system for ideas for music or other creations

     yes

      and if so how is it organized?

     a textual list by title (usually chronological), and they reference a text file which is the contents, including references to audio/video files which provide better demonstrations/descriptions. sometimes for a small idea it might not have its own text file yet so in the list it would just reference directly to a audio/vid file

6.9.19  6:25 pm   honestly america should have wombats. y/n?

     i thought america had all the wombats. wombats is their mascot

6.9.19  5:37 pm   If you could use 1 genre to describe your music, what would it be?

     that's not what the hell i signed up for

6.9.19  5:03 pm   why doesnt my daw let me command z volume slider changes ffs

     this is to make you listen more

6.9.19  4:42 pm   what is something you like about answering questions?

     i like when there's no answer. that way i can feel like some kinda magician if i find one

6.9.19  4:35 pm   what do i do if i don't feel like i'm enough

     you could try being more

6.9.19  3:46 pm   what can a train do that i cant

     single handedly destroy the horse travel industry

6.9.19  3:38 pm   you got any cleaning tips

     you must understand dirt. think like the dirt

6.9.19  2:33 pm   do you think people would make fun of me if i went to the store and bought some stuff or is that too crazy

     doesn't matter, once you get back you can make fun of them for not having stuff

6.9.19  2:17 pm   do you deliberately juxtapose predictable, almost tropey lyrical rhymes (song/wrong, day/away, blue/true/you) with unpredictable and unprecedented, un-tropey subject matter (e.g. "2+2" etc. in la de da, verse 2 of mt. st. helens, last stanza of new canaan)? or does it just seem to work out that way? anyway i think it does a great job of proving that even the most """"""predictable"""""" rhyme can become vivacious and fresh if you don't keep forcing it into the same stupid line it's been stuck in for years against its will

     that reminds me of ingredients. don't eat the ingredients individually, but also don't insist on using entirely brand new ingredients for every single ingredient every single time

6.9.19  2:03 pm   are you still making videos?

     yes

6.9.19  1:51 pm   What's your nationality?

     all of them i wish

6.9.19  1:17 pm   how do you know you're not dead

     if you are wondering, then you must be alive. wondering is exactly what someone who is alive would do

6.9.19  12:43 pm   Do you hate gnomes

     no

6.9.19  12:26 pm   Can you break an egg from the inside just with your hands?

     no

6.9.19  11:14 am   have you ever challenged your brain to not think of anything for 5-10 minutes, like mentally transport yourself to a place of nothingness/serenity

     that's not a place. if it were a place then i would just think about that place

6.9.19  11:11 am   Other than writing and making music plus videos, what do you like to do?

     explore and think about things

6.9.19  10:38 am   Hey, are you going to come to Berlin?

     that sounds like a pretty reasonable idea

6.9.19  10:36 am   What is 9+10

     100

6.9.19  10:31 am   Help I dont understand keys

     then you might not have had anything locked before

6.9.19  8:00 am   Where do you brainstorm video ideas

     just above the earth's crust

6.9.19  7:34 am   give us a 1-second snippet we haven't heard before from the new song 

     i would love to and i think i would and should but i just think it may be slightly irresponsible at this point

6.9.19  7:23 am   how does one DO the frolicking things in life?

     should be the default setting

6.9.19  6:53 am   do u want some chocolate

     have too much

6.9.19  4:00 am   where do all these people who ask if youve disappeared come from. do these dudes remember you exist, check your youtube, get angry enough at no new content to google more about you, somehow navigate to questions, and then (after putting in all the effort to get here) immediately ask if youve given up on everything without bothering to read a single days worth of questions on this page? shit makes no sense bro

     seems normal to me

6.9.19  2:11 am   What percentage of your new video is done. Please answer honestly.

     about 50% of 40% of it, if you can calculate that. that's just for the video. the audio is 100% done

6.9.19  1:09 am   I feel as though you embody a nice balance of both groups in this example:

The ceramics teacher announced on opening day that he was dividing the class into two groups. All those on the left side of the studio, he said, would be graded solely on the quantity of work they produced, all those on the right solely on its quality.

His procedure was simple: on the final day of class he would bring in his bathroom scales and weigh the work of the "quantity" group: fifty pound of pots rated an "A", forty pounds a "B", and so on. Those being graded on "quality", however, needed to produce only one pot – albeit a perfect one – to get an "A".

     a weird thing may happen, where the speed people end up learning how to make better pots by the end, where as the "quality" people are only making 1 pot so they hardly ever got any experience

      Well, came grading time and a curious fact emerged: the works of highest quality were all produced by the group being graded for quantity.

     aah, i knew it, i wrote the last part without reading ahead

      It seems that while the "quantity" group was busily churning out piles of work – and learning from their mistakes – the "quality" group had sat theorizi ng about perfection, and in the end had little more to show for their efforts than grandiose theories and a pile of dead clay.

     entirely relatable

6.8.19  11:56 pm   also how much does rhythm play a role in doing bass fills?

     about 96 to 98 percent. also what the heck is a bass fill

6.8.19  11:54 pm   hey bill I have a crippling fear of doing bass fills live and my friend who is the guitar player said i have to just do it. how true is this in your opinion/experience? 

     if you don't wanna do it then you're not gonna do it well. it's like being in a waiting room. if you've been in there for 9 hours, you're gonna wanna go buck wild and flip off the walls and do backflips etc, and this is fine because after 9 hours you should know the shape of that room. But if you are in there for 2 min and then someone says 'ok you gotta start doing flips man' , .....that could be a little risky if you don't know what the room is all about yet. by room i mean the song. once you know a song well then you will be able to take care of the song, and then do all your back flips, and you'll know all the twist and turns of the song so you'll know when you gotta be home by. if you know the song then you're gonna know when and where you have time to have your feet not be on the ground. if you don't know where those bumps are, you could jump at the wrong time and everyone will fall in the river

6.8.19  11:38 pm   would you rather be called an artist or a creator?

     i don't care

      which do you prefer? huh?

6.8.19  11:00 pm   what is something we can all be happy about?

     circles, and possibly ovals too

6.8.19  10:53 pm   Is there any correlation between your most popular songs and your personal favorite songs that you write? Do you have a favorite(s) song(s) of yours?

     i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

6.8.19  10:31 pm   Do you find people asking when the next video will be out annoying? Cause I would be if I ran a channel

     it is their way of displaying friendliness and friendship

6.8.19  10:28 pm   how can i become a better person?

      have you considered that you might already be too good

6.8.19  10:02 pm   tips & tricks 4 life?

     everyone else has it worse than you

6.8.19  9:14 pm   can you recommend me some good buttons to click on?

     no more buttons, they've all been clicked

6.8.19  8:50 pm   Which of the major food groups do you appreciate most?

     i don't appreciate the grouping system. the way the lines are drawn between the groups, etc

6.8.19  7:59 pm   how would you reinvent the egg

     would not. the damn thing is perfect the way it is

6.8.19  7:28 pm                                                                              how much?

     about 75

6.8.19  7:17 pm   bro omg did you make a 3d model of yourself already???

     yes but it's best not to really use it due to uncanny valley
